name: Turbo Toons
overview: The craziest, funniest race ever is about to start. 5 player simultaneous racing and a 5 player simultaneous head to head challenge mode. Featuring over 20 classic Hanna Barbera characters including Yogi Bear, Hong Kong Phooey, Captain Caveman and Top Cat in a rampant, hilarious dash-around! Over 30 different tracks to compete on! Superb game play this is so hard to find in games these days! Only one game gives you all this and more, and if you hadn't guessed yet, it's right here in your hands!
